DATA.TEXT: Hey, lady! We have a package for you!
The girl seems lost in her own thoughts, wandering through unending halls of memories.
Uhhh, helloooo? Hey, we have a package for you!
Um, well... are you alright? You look so sad there alone, staring at your phone!
I'm fine. I, uh, I'm just trying to send a message.
Oh! Are you not getting any cosmo-fi?
...I'm too afraid to ask someone to go with me to the festival.
I... she probably doesn't feel the same way...
Oh, right... Maybe your delivery will help me?
